jparsec.graph

Class ChartSeriesElement3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.ChartSeriesElement3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChartSeriesElement3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Creates a series for later use in JMathPlot.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.awt.Color color
      Selects the color of the series.
      boolean drawLines
      True (default false) to draw segments instead of the points, only when the data is not a surface.
      double[] dxValues
      Array of dx values.
      double[] dyValues
      Array of dy values.
      double[] dzValues
      Array of dz values.
      boolean isBarPlot
      True (default false) to draw segments from each point to the base of the chart, only when the data is not a surface and drawLines is false.
      boolean isSurface
      True (default false) to treat the data as a surface.

      Legend.

      • pointers

        public java.lang.String[] pointers
        Sets the text to pointers in an x-y chart. Format is point number (in the order defined by the x array, being 1 the first point) plus the text to write. Pointers and labels are set automatically.

      • color

        public java.awt.Color color
        Selects the color of the series.

      • showErrorBars

        public boolean showErrorBars
        True (default) to show error bars.

      • isSurface

        public boolean isSurface
        True (default false) to treat the data as a surface.

      • drawLines

        public boolean drawLines
        True (default false) to draw segments instead of the points, only when the data is not a surface.

      • isBarPlot

        public boolean isBarPlot
        True (default false) to draw segments from each point to the base of the chart, only when the data is not a surface and drawLines is false.

      • get3dPointsFromDataSet

        public static DoubleVector[] get3dPointsFromDataSet(double[][] data,
                                    double[] limits)
        Transform a dataset from a GridChartElement to a set of 3d points.
        Parameters:
        data - The data as a regural array.
        limits - The limits: minX, maxX, minY, maxY.
        Returns:
        The points.

      • getSurfaceFromPoints

        public static ChartSeriesElement3D getSurfaceFromPoints(DoubleVector[] points,
                                        int n)
                                                 throws JPARSECException
        Creates a surface series given an irregular set of points that lies on it. This method uses an interpolation algorithm similar to a discrete Fourier transform, but more adequate to properly treat the 'holes'. If the points contain no holes and are sampled regularly it is recommended to use 2d spline interpolation with class ImageSplineTransform.
        Parameters:
        points - The array of points.
        n - The number of points in the x and y axis of the output regular profile.
        Returns:
        The series, with empty string for the legend.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getLimits

        public double[] getLimits()
                   throws JPARSECException
        Returns the limits of the dataset in this series.
        Returns:
        Minimum x, maximum x, minimum y, maximum y.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.
